formdata.description: Specialization: ELECTRICAL, PLUMBING, HVAC, GENERAL, CARPENTRY, PAINTING
ID card/passport (jpg, png, gif, pdf - max 5MB)
Residence permit (jpg, png, gif, pdf - max 5MB)

request.description: Update technician profile with all fields. All fields are optional. Supports file uploads for photo, ID card, residence permit, and certificates. Uses upsert - creates profile if it doesn't exist.
Register FCM token for push notifications. Supports multiple devices per user.
